title: (11160) Barbate - 65 Calle Ramón y Cajal
description: A water point is available 24/24 on the edge of the beach. Showers and public toilets.

title: (11160) Barbate - 1 Calle Pez Espada
description: Good place for micro camper. it is possible to spend the night without problem. in winter very quiet. in noisy summer.

title: (11160) Barbate - s/n Calle Islas Baleares
description: Shower on the beach

title: (11160) Barbate - Avenida Atlántico
description: Nice place to sleep with a car or caravan without any problem. Free, there is only one gorilla and if you want then you can give him something.

title: (11160) Barbate - 23 Calle Profesor Tierno Galván
description: Place to wash clothes and dry

title: (11160) Barbate - 95 Avenida Cabo Diego Pérez Rodríguez
title_short: (11160) Barbate - 95 Avenida Cabo Diego Pérez Rodríguez
description: Parking at the end of the dead end street, on the beach, with pickinc table. We have just spent one night with 2 other camper and 3 vans. noise passers-by leaving the bar until midnight then calm until 9:45 the next morning at the opposite company. mercadona 300m free and more with sea views.

title: (11160) Barbate - A-2233
description: Public parking, next to the pier, quiet area. Asphalted

title: (11160) Barbate - Av. de la Mar
description: Repsol gas cylinders come to buy / exchange open from 9.30 am to 2 pm 5 pm to 8 pm except Sundays 9.45 am to 1 pm

title: (11160) Barbate - 24 Calle Zapal
description: Free parking near laundromat

title: (11160) Barbate - 142 Avenida de la Mar
description: good place to spend the night

title: (11160) Barbate -
description: Beautifull place just outside the town. Local rod fishermen, Rocky Beach and amazing views. Low tide water, very unique

title: (11160) Barbate - 142 Avenida de la Mar
description: Large parking lot very,  quiet , near the restaurant withe fresh fish.

title: (11160) Barbate - Unnamed Road
description: Hot shower / WC (free) // Washing machine and dryer. Ask for the code of the front door at the back of the building at the port office. The code changes regularly. Clean shower and toilet. Parking lot next door

title: (11160) Barbate - A-2231
description: It is a sandy esplanade at the entrance to the botero beach and the south beach of barbate. There are no services or anything, just a restaurant across the street that closes at 6:00 p.m. It is a quiet place, but no lighting.

title: (11160) Barbate - 6 Calle Hermanos Romero Abreu
description: Parking near the river, very quiet and free.

name: Area de Autocaravanas Puerto de Barbate
title: (11160) Area de Autocaravanas Puerto de Barbate
title_short: (11160) Area de Autocaravanas Puerto de Barbate
description: Marina of Barbate authorized by the Junta de Andalucía. Excellent high level RV parking with views and gated beach access. The access code to the door and to the services is provided on the telephone. Access by a barrier by positioning your vehicle in front of it (about 1m). In the case of several motorhomes, a minimum distance of 3 meters must be respected at the entrance and wait for the barrier to lower before positioning yourself in front of it. If there are free places, the barrier will open automatically taking the registration data and the time of entry into the area. To request your stay in the area, you must enter the first two digits of your license plate and select yours from those offered by the system. You must select one of the places offered by the system as free (green), indicate the days of stay you want and proceed to payment with your card. There are 5 power supply points in the area. Water service (non-standard sprinkler) and black and gray water disposal available. Free showers, as well as all port services (far from the parking area). In the glass building in the background..

title: (11160) Barbate - Av. de la Mar
description: Flat sand parking, with two beach bars in the image says that you can not park on the beach. some areas are a bit uneven (very little uneven) no noise 100m from the beach. there is no signage that prohibits anything

title: (11160) Barbate - 3 Plaza Reyes Catolicos
description: Water at the Cepsa service station.

title: (11160) Barbate - A-314
description: Commercial center with 3 supermarkets at the exit of Barbate. Good parking for vans and AC. Near the gas station.

title: (11160) Barbate - 4 Calle Pesquero Joven Alonso
description: Shady pine forest and parking area in the soccer field area and next to the river promenade. A 15 minute walk from the beach.

name: Campo y Mar
title: (11160) Campo y Mar
description: Campo y Mar. Freshwater, black water, and grey waste emptying available.  Has toilets and showers.  Electric is included.  Can stay inside the walled area or on the artificial grass plots in the grounds outside the walled garden.  The town is 3 km away, A nature reserve with Flamingos behind the site, A beautiful natural sandy beach across the road.  Very friendly owners will pick things up from the shops if needed, or give you a lift into town.  Great vibe to the place.

title: (11160) Barbate - A-2231
description: A passage to the beach just in front. Without service. There is not much difference in level. The road is very close, so it is a little more uncomfortable to sleep but otherwise it is a quiet and perfect place to enjoy the beach, ideal for children.

title: (11160) Barbate - 36 Calle Luis Braille
description: It is the parking lot of a hiking trail that runs along the coast. Okay, near the road that in August has some traffic. The civil guard has passed and has not told us anything and we are three meetings camped with tables and chairs outside. It has shadow. If you want to take a place you must come at the end of the afternoon as the parked cars are leaving. It has no service, and it is free.

title: (11160) Barbate - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place near Barbate on the edge of a marsh (but few mosquitoes). Easily accessible by a wide dirt road. Many sites spaced fairly flat all along the road. The Guarda Civil came by during the night and said nothing to us.

title: (11150) Barbate - Avenida de la Mar
description: Perfect place to spend day and night, spectacular landscapes, you have the natural park of the Breña with trails and the beaches of Barbate, usually there is always company of some van.

title: (11160) Barbate - A-2231
description: Parking by the sea, during the day only, from 8 am to 10 pm, in July and August (military field the rest of the year)

title: (11160) Barbate - 241 A-2231
description: Military zone, which, if there are no maneuvers, it is open to the public from 8:00 to 22:00. At night, the site is closed, so it's not a place to stay. Many people with dogs on the beach. Highly recommended!

title: (11150) Barbate - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking, tables to eat in the shade in the pine forest with the cows. Big space. Open from 9 am to 10 pm, but it is possible to sleep in the car park: to test. Near the road, but not

title: (11150) Barbate - Unnamed Road
description: Old portion of road almost disused: serves as a desert to local farms. Suitable for small vehicles. Very calm and isolated from the main road.

title: (11150) Barbate - Avenida Generalísimo
description: Picnic area, open from 9h to 22h. Small bar and games for children, tables and barbecues, starting tracks for the pine forest. Family. Small parking in the shade, trash.

name: Soul Casas
title: (11150) Soul Casas
description:
Parking on a holiday finca with apartments, a beautiful garden and 2 pools in the middle of nature! We have a sunny spot and a shady spot. Sewage disposal, electricity, water,cold outside shower, toilet and washing machine. Limited length: 9m.
Reservation only possible by phone.

title: (11150) Barbate - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot of the Land-art-Museum. Great place partly under pines. Very little traffic. Must visit museum: 5 euros, open 10-14, during this period also toilets open.

title: (11393) Barbate - A-2231
description: Possible to stay the day, excellent on the beach and with the possibility of staying overnight but 5 meters from the main road

title: (11159) Los Caños de Meca - 13 Avenida Trafalgar
title_short: (11159) Los Caños de Meca - 13 Avenida Trafalgar
description: It is a guarded pay parking, which opens until 22:00. It is fenced. You cannot stay overnight and it is chargeable. It is next to the beach, 2 minutes walk. We come with our 7-meter AC and without a problem, the owner gave us a plot a little wider than the others. The terrain is sand/dirt.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
description: Location on the heights of Vejer, very nice view of the sea. Rather easy access path although it does not appear on the map, it is the access path to the wind turbines.

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 14 Calle el Peñón
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 14 Calle el Peñón
description: Place on the beach, next to it. Access by paved road and somewhat fair since people park to go to restaurants. Sandy area not very deep, but you always have to walk with caution. Very quiet night, we did not find out any noise and the next day we walked along the beach, which is less than 1 'away. Some light pollution, but you can see the stars if the Moon allows it.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino de la Oliva
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino de la Oliva
description: Fifteen minutes from the city, land next to a pine forest with picnic area. Without services.

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 1 Calle Thompson
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 1 Calle Thompson
description: It is a piece of land next to the road, just at the entrance roundabout. Enter 2 motorhomes (it is small space) but it is next to the town (5min walking from the beach) and it is ideal to spend the day (not for the night because it is not level and the road is next). You avoid getting into the narrow streets of the town (there are not many more places to park)

name: Camping Vejer
title: (11150) Camping Vejer
description: Camping with 100 plots, among pine trees and shaded by pine trees, great pool, new bathrooms. The restaurant's cuisine is spectacular. Small grocery store, etc. Local fresh fruits and vegetables.

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 1 Calle Cerro Currita
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 1 Calle Cerro Currita
description: Low pressure drinking water

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 5 Calle Cerro Currita
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 5 Calle Cerro Currita
description: Beach parking with access for about 20 vehicles.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino de la Oliva
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino de la Oliva
description: Just street parking if you get kicked out of the park above, lol

name: Camping Vejer
title: (11150) Camping Vejer
description: The locality is beside a national park and 2-3k from Vejer Del La Frontera one of the most lovely towns in Spain. The site has water, electricity, and wi-fi included in the price. Sandy pitches an not all level but no problem. Staff wonderful great stop off point.

title: (11150) Barbate - Carretera Arroyo San Ambrosio
description: Small flat space in the courtyard of the hermitage in the grass, surrounded by agricultural land. Long track with holes to get here. Access to the chapel requires good ground clearance and a vehicle of less than 6m. The garden is now fenced and only a van will park there. There's a small clearance before a bridge where 2 7m RV can fit easily. We parked there for two nights without a problem. The road adjacent is busy at times, but not bothering.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera -
description: Quiet place next to a horse paddock. the approach is a 3km long gravel road (public) and a piece of dirt road. No problem with the Bulli or Sprinter! We were there one night in the high season and had no problems. Place is very remote, quiet and partly with shade. On the dirt road there are always smaller indentations where you can simply stand on the edge and not stand in the way.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 5 Calle Juan Ramón Jimenez
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 5 Calle Juan Ramón Jimenez
description: Parking area outside of Vejer. Next to a park with fountain. Very quiet area with little traffic.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 84 Calle Hijuela de Lucas
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 84 Calle Hijuela de Lucas
description: Fairground, we slept one night without problem quiet and close to the center

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 24 Calle Palacio de las Pilas
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 24 Calle Palacio de las Pilas
description: Small car park for a few motorhomes. Authorized in winter. Beach and town nearby. No noise.

title: (11150) Barbate - Carretera Arroyo San Ambrosio
description: Quiet Lugo, secondary road, the sun arrives late 9/10 as it is sheltered by a small hill. Unpaved access road

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 36E Paseo del Pradillo
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 36E Paseo del Pradillo
description: Parking by the beach. Toilets and beach showers by the beach bar. Short walk to nearest restaurants and shops. You can hear music from the beach bar so if you want an early night and you are a light sleeper, bring earplugs :)

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 3 Calle Zafra
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 3 Calle Zafra
description: A free gravel place that is very suitable for parking and sleeping. At about 50 meters a magnificent view of the old town.

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 2-6 Урбанисасьон Кольмена
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 2-6 Урбанисасьон Кольмена
description: October doesn't have to be out of season. Just to park it is expensive parking for one person! No service.

title: (11150) Barbate - Avenida de Buenavista
description: Slightly uneven space for a maximum of two mobile homes. Please first look at the driveway on foot to see if you want to use it. Could start up with a 5 t Iveco box wagon without any problems.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 11 Calle Hijuela de Lucas
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 11 Calle Hijuela de Lucas
description: Although it is complicated to park in the center of Vejer, at this place without being a wonder, one can do one night after visit, dinner and sleep until dawn. Without too much noise and with a cafeteria directly opposite for breakfast.

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 5 Calle Sierra del Retín
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 5 Calle Sierra del Retín
description: Parking day 2eur , there is not shadow at all. Close to city center and 5 min walk to beach.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 13 Calle Don Quijote
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 13 Calle Don Quijote
description: Free parking, near the city center, beautiful view

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 29 Avenida de Buenavista
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 29 Avenida de Buenavista
description: Plenty of free street parking close to a dogs park, kids playground, supermarket, bars and other businesses. 5 minutes up the hill to wind mills and 10 minutes down the hill to the historic center. it's perfect if you are traveling with a dog as the town's dogs park is here. probably not suited for campers longer than 7 meters

title: (11159) Barbate - 9 A-2233
description: Near the entrance of the pipe, 10 m. Beach. Forbidden to camp.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 22 Calle José María Pemán
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 22 Calle José María Pemán
description: Parking at the exit of Vejer, area with little light and very quiet

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 33 Paseo del Pradillo
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - 33 Paseo del Pradillo
description: Quiet street to sleep. We have spent 3 days during the May 1 bridge. We had several motorhomes.

title: (11393) Barbate - 25 Avenida Sierra de Martín
description: Parking surrounded by urbanizations, close to a supermarket and 200 meters from the beach. Quiet place to spend the day.

title: (11393) Barbate - 1 Urbanización Colmena
description: Parking lot for spend day and night, free. Close to the beach and city. Not for chilling, but if you need spot to sleep, its safe. We spended 1 night here. Spot is bussy, and you can hear noice from bars, but its without fines :) height limit 2.2m

title: (11159) Los Caños de Meca - 147 Avenida Trafalgar
title_short: (11159) Los Caños de Meca - 147 Avenida Trafalgar
description: Old unused hotel run by Felix, quiet car park guarded by himself. The beach across the road and there is a wooden path that takes you to the sea. It has no services, it is a quiet parking lot and there are more motorhomes and vans. Pretty much level.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 4a Calle Perla de Cádiz
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 4a Calle Perla de Cádiz
description: Open every day, including Sundays. A washing machine of 14 kg, two of 10 kg. and two dryers. I parked the AC 7 m. on the main street, Avenida Andalucía, near the carrefour market. It is the flat part.

title: (11393) Barbate - 23 CA-2216
description: It is a large paved parking lot, with access to the beach. It is 5 minutes walk from the village. In the summer, generally, you are not allowed to park or stay overnight

title: (11393) Tarifa - 19 Quebrantamichos
description: Hotel car park and Antonio restaurant. In autumn we had no problem spending the night here, super quiet. Without services

name: Area Caños de Meca / Galeón
title: (11159) Area Caños de Meca / Galeón
description:
Área Caños de Meca Camper Park Motorhome. OPEN ALL YEAR ROUND
Overnight stay area for motorhomes, campers and vans. 150m from the beach of Caños de Meca, ideal for resting, surrounded by mastic trees, wild olive trees and other autochthonous flora, very close to the Trafalgar lighthouse. Postcard beaches, surrounded by nature, in the Natural Park of La Breña and the Marshes of Barbate. Close to the route of the white villages: Conil de la Frontera, Vejer de la Frontera, a paradisiacal place, dreamlike sunsets. Restaurants, bars and hippy shops nearby. 
Open every day. 
We recommend checking availability and booking.
We offer 40m2 plots with trees, electricity in each pitch, freshly baked bread and croissants every morning, toilets, showers, automatic washing machines, tumble dryer, sinks, washbasins, drinking water, and grey and black water drainage. 
Open every day. 
We offer the best of us, to make you as comfortable as possible in a really beautiful place.

title: (11393) Tarifa - 11 Quebrantamichos
description: Very quiet beachfront parking

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 45a Calle los Remedios
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 45a Calle los Remedios
description: Presence of a drinking water tap in the park near the children's play area

name: Camping du Cabo de Trafalgar
title: (11159) Camping du Cabo de Trafalgar
description: Camping Faro de Trafalgar. The GPS coordinates on here take you to a side street with no turning points. The camp entrance is on the main A2233 road. On 19 January it was closed.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 36 N-340
description: Cepsa service station Drinking water service and free tire inflation.

name: Bar restaurante Las Dunas
title: (11159) Bar restaurante Las Dunas
description: Las Duñas Restaurant. Caños de Meca. Beautiful wooden chiringuito and you eat very well.Restaurant  Very friendly owners. There is a hose with NON potable water for public use. Pecnating without problems. No motorhomes. On weekends in summer difficult to park but not impossible. Wide beach with duñas.

title: (11159) Barbate - 264 Calle Poniente
description: Parking next to Hostal las Acacias. On the side of a very busy road but perfect for a walk to the Trafalgar lighthouse. Perfect for CC too. 3 seats.

name: Camping Bahia de la Plata
title: (11393) Camping Bahia de la Plata
description: Campsite Bahia de la Plata! Very small and few toilets and showers for so many people. Direct access to the beach 1.5 km from Azahara de los Atunes. It offers cheaper free camping space (with very little shade).

title: (11393) Tarifa - CA-2216
description: Parking for caravans and motorhomes with surveillance and very close to the beach sewage service

title: (11393) Tarifa - Carretera de Atlanterra
description: The car park, 20 places, there is no shadows but it is next to the beach in July and August there is more noise because there is a disco there

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 94 Santa Lucía
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 94 Santa Lucía
description: A source of drinking water. Very good quality

name: Camping Pinar San José
title: (11159) Camping Pinar San José
description: Campsite prepared for motorhomes. Daily activities for children.

title: (11159) Barbate - 10800 A-2233
description:
Lugar tranquilo y apacible. Trato amable y muy familiar. Volveremos.
 Próximo a Conil de la frontera, Barbate y el Palmar.

title: (11393) Tarifa - CA-2216
description: The only site in the whole area that has not set height limit or prohibition for absurd signals. Very long motorhomes do not enter. Next to it there is a municipal car park that seems to me that there is no problem in parking except Mondays for the market. La churreria del moth highly recommended

name: Camping Canos de Meca
title: (11159) Camping Canos de Meca
description: Camping Canos de Meca! Nice shaded campspot. No grass, only dust. Nice pool. Super clean facilities.

title: (11159) Barbate - 245 Camino de la Aceitera
description: GOOD WAVES ZAHORA | OPEN | ONLY FOR VANS, NOT MOTORHOMES. Contact before coming. 4 individual plots, just 5 -7 min walk to Zahora beach. Very quiet place surrounded by nature. A perfect place to relax, with water, wifi, bbq, clean bathrooms and hot showers, covered chill out space and a nice community garden. We also have a garden, chickens and quails! Be part of our project focused on sustainability, respect for the environment and vegan and vegetarian food that comes from our garden.

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 1881 Santa Lucía
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - 1881 Santa Lucía
description: Free parking, at least in the low season (we have been in November). Perfect place to make the route of the mills. Store with organic products right next door and "Venta el Toro" to eat.

title: (11158) Vejer de la Frontera - 2 Calle Cañada Ancha 6
title_short: (11158) Vejer de la Frontera - 2 Calle Cañada Ancha 6
description: Washing with a pressure gun, with structure on the side for tall vehicles

title: (11393) Tarifa - 2 Carretera de Atlanterra
description: Car parks in a quiet area, next to the road but without much traffic at night, the area is level, there are no services, it is halfway between the Atlanterra area and the town of Zahara, perhaps a bit far if you want to visit the town on foot. the beach is not too far. We spent one night together with several cars and vans and without any problem.

title: (11393) Tarifa - 1 Carretera de Atlanterra
description: No service. Near the beach

title: (11159) Cádiz - Unnamed road
description: There are a few trees and little shade. They can park cars and they let motorhomes park. If you arrive at night it will be open and in the morning they will charge you. There are toilets and a shower.

title: (11159) Cádiz - Zahora, 158
description: Private parking 300m from the beach of Zahora very close to the best chiringuitos. It has showers.  They left us a private space for us. At night there is no one. Very friendly

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - Unnamed Road
description: On the outskirts of Zahara de los Atunes you can find this car park, it is a straight line with parking on the sides. It is next to the beach, 1 min walk. In low season there is no car and no problem, but in high season it will be a crowded place

title: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - s/n Carretera de Atlanterra
title_short: (11393) Zahara de los Atunes - s/n Carretera de Atlanterra
description: Asphalt parking of Zahara Villas, has room for 5 vans, on Sundays Zahara Villas does not open so perfect for sleeping on Saturdays

title: (11391) Tarifa - 2 Urbanización Atlanterra F
description: Parking of the buildings quiet place

title: (11393) Tarifa - 8 Carretera de Atlanterra
description: Public parking is an esplanade of land and grass very quiet where there are many cars parked ideal for an overnight stay. It does not have any service but it is quite clean, you cannot take out chairs or tables

title: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Km 7 Carretera Vereda de Cantarranas
title_short: (11150) Vejer de la Frontera - Km 7 Carretera Vereda de Cantarranas
description: Gas station, self-wash, restaurant, gas bottles

title: (11391) Tarifa - 58B Urbanización Atlanterra F
description: Parking with capacity for approx 8 ac if there are no cars. Asphalted and with garbage containers. Access to Bunker beach at 10mt, you have to go down some stairs.

title: (11159) Zahora - Unnamed Road
description: You should not park here, it is illegal, a protected area and a natural park, they have removed the sign prohibiting the entry of motor vehicles but if the guard comes they will fine you and they usually come repeatedly, respect the environment and walk to the beach.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 2 Arrabal Sector Cabo de Gracia
title_short: (11391) Tarifa - 2 Arrabal Sector Cabo de Gracia
description: Small dirt parking lot next to the road for a maximum of two vans. There is a trash can next to it and it is next to the road. It's very good because behind the parking lot there are bushes/trees and you can see the whole mountain.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 32D Atlanterra Playa
description: Large parking lot with three rows for over 40 cars. Small camper vans find space. Access to the beach about 100 meters, with stone access.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Unnamed Road
description: Chambala beach bar parking only 50 meters from the beach. Please keep vanlife alive. Cleanup trash that isn't yours and leave places cleaner than on arrival. Don't use nature as your toilet!

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - s/n Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - s/n Paseo Marítimo
description: Private land in front of the sea with ocean view (first line, 50m), flat land, fenced, enough space for 20 caravans. A well-known spot for surfing and other water sports (kite, windsurf, SUP...). Close to surf shops, equipment rentals, bars, good restaurants (seafood, local dishes). Please call the owner before to find out if it is possible to park!

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 9999 Carretera camino de la playa
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 9999 Carretera camino de la playa
description: A quiet place to spend the night, road next to it but very good for spending the night, it doesn't seem like the police are coming. Free

title: (11391) Tarifa - 40B Atlanterra Playa
description: Parking 100 m from the beach. Very quiet.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
description: Perfect for day parking. amazing views from this place.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Atlanterra Playa, 4
description: Quiet location, in a residential area.

name: Camping El Palmar
title: (11159) Camping El Palmar
description: Vejer de la Frontera, A-2233. Camping El Palmar

title: (11391) - 6D Arrabal Sector Cabo de Gracia
description: Last section of a road at the end of an urbanization where the lighthouse is accessed, cars parked to have dinner or sleep at the lighthouse. For a van or motorhome there would be one or two seats on top of everything, which is the only flat space. When we went there was some garbage but the visits are spectacular and quite quiet

title: (11159) El Palmar de Vejer -
description: Green and quiet place with a lot of shade, ideal to relax for a few days. It has a bathroom with a hot shower and the possibility of charging mobile phones and computers. Please no hair dryers. Our 6 cats are very curious about you, so unfortunately we cannot allow dogs. minimum 3 nights, maximum 2 people.

title: (11159) El Palmar de Vejer - s/n Camino de Guerrero
title_short: (11159) El Palmar de Vejer - s/n Camino de Guerrero
description: We have a parking for motorhomes in the area of El Palmar (Cádiz). The plot is located in the Carril de los Guerreros, just a 5-minute walk from its wonderful beaches. The parking is divided into spaces for ten vehicles and, in addition, it is closed with a door to which each tenant will have their own key. We do not have water, electricity or a deposit for gray water. We only offer parking.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 105 Camino del Camping
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 105 Camino del Camping
description: 3 minutes from the beach, quiet and free

name: Area autocaravanas El Palmar
title: (11159) Area autocaravanas El Palmar
description: Parking for caravans, motorhomes and campers. 20 euros, plus 5 euros for electricity, plus 3 euros for emptying gray and black water. Free water filling. WC and showers for ladies and gentlemen, as well as adapted for the disabled. Very attentive and professional staff. 159 seats. Booking convenient.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Unnamed Road
description: Large square next to the road that climbs the hill from the town of Bolonia. h Direction towards "Cueva del Moro". Place for large or small motorhome.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking of Santa Guadalupe from 9am to 2am motorhomes are allowed throughout the day without overnight.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
description: Palmar Center car park. Possibility to take water, but there is no gray or black drain.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to park. Road in bad condition. Beautiful view at the foot of the heath cave. Night forbidden.

title: (11392) Tahivilla - E-5
description: Gas station with column for air and water

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
description: La Orilla car park, paying. It has no service but they allow you to stay overnight. The Sandplastz is located in the center of El Palmar. It is quiet.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Unnamed Road
description: A bit further up the lane from the view point already listed. larger space mostly flat with very good views. occasional traffic,  the road surface is a bit rough but good, steep in places but my little 6mtr climbed no problem.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - 323 Camino de Guerrero
description: Paid parking. No chairs, awning etc. What we have done is go from parking lot to parking lot until one of them lets you pass, because not all owners allow it.

name: Parking Nomada El Palmar
title: (11159) Parking Nomada El Palmar
description: Parking for motorhomes, next to the sea prepared with the necessary facilities to enjoy the beaches of Palmar de Vejer!

name: Parking Atlantico
title: (11159) Parking Atlantico
description: Parking area, without the possibility of staying overnight. Access is good but the parking lot was full of mud and puddles. The person who checked us in was friendly. There is no service.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino del Pino
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Camino del Pino
description: Great area, a bit of a bumpy entrance (enter through Camino del Pino). It has a bar, showers, electricity and clean (non drinkable) water. Cool staff.

title: (11392) Tahivilla - 5A Calle de la Venta
description: Recreation area with tables, grills, sinks and toilets. Preferably the water source. Sometimes windy.

title: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
title_short: (11159) Vejer de la Frontera - Paseo Marítimo
description: Park next to the street. Beach access, surf spot. No service.

name: La Casita de Ángela
title: (11159) La Casita de Ángela
description: Garden in family house, close to the beach (400m). Nudist zone.

title: (11391) Tarifa - CA-8202
description: Visiting roman site baelo claudia

title: (11391) Tarifa - Pista Vereda de la Reginosa
title_short: (11391) Tarifa - Pista Vereda de la Reginosa
description: Parking next to the beach in Bologna. It is a rocky area that must be walked with caution. Women like "gorrillas" asked for money to park; If you walk towards the dune there is a shower (a bit hidden, not directly on the beach)

title: (11391) Tarifa - 16 El Lentiscal
description: Small parking very close to the beach, and with the advantage that you do not have sand walking from the caravan, but if it is a small lawn, which serves as a beautiful garden. In the summer, there are a lot of people and you have to arrive early, but in the rest of the seasons there are free places

title: (11391) Tarifa - 38 El Lentiscal
description: The only point of sale of butane gas in Bologna

title: (11391) Tarifa - 27 El Lentiscal
description: Fenced for caravans and motorhomes, ideal for sleep and rest, close to the beach, grass and very clean carriageways, the manager charges for night parking, no services.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 23 El Lentiscal
description: Parking enabled for vehicles, when we arrived was late and we did not pay, there were camper vans

title: (11391) Tarifa - 4 El Lentiscal
description: Parking more or less level, to spend the day only, very close to the beach. There is a supermarket right at the entrance.  The nearby archaeological site is free. Beautiful view of the Bolonia dune

title: (11179) Medina-Sidonia - 122 Lugar Cucarrete
description: Parking next to the road and at the beginning of a perfect road to go with dogs and children. The parking lot is very large and quiet at night. On the other side of the road is the Pheasant sale for lunch or coffee, closed on Mondays.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 4 El Lentiscal
description: Height limit 2.20 Fairly large and level esplanade, next to the beach and a public shower, near Chiringuito and grocery store.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 39 El Lentiscal
description: Small parking for 3 or 4 motorhomes at the foot of the road next to the Marisma pizzeria ... beach at 50 m. The terrain is not completely flat

title: (11391) El Lentiscal - 41 El Lentiscal
description: Parking to spend the night in Bologna, without services and not quite well leveled, the kid passes at the last minute and charges.

title: (11391) El Lentiscal - 28 El Lentiscal
description: Beautiful lawn overlooking the beach and the dunes of Bolonia. There is a playground and a soccer field right next door, as well as some bars and restaurants. The beach and dunes are within walking distance.

name: Parking AC y Furgo Paqui
title: (11391) Parking AC y Furgo Paqui
description: Motorhome and Camper Park, dirt parking with capacity for about 30 motorhomes, you pay €10 per night, camping is not allowed, but you can take out half an awning, table and chairs to eat, very narrow entrance, motorhomes pass just a bit,

title: (11391) El Lentiscal - 3 El Lentiscal
description: Dirt parking just in front of the caravan parking. Somewhat uneven terrain. It has no height limit. All the surrounding parking areas (especially those facing the beach) have a limit of 2.20). If you don't need any specific service, it's a good alternative to sleep since the caravan park is little more than a fenced-in vacant lot. In our case it was plan B since the areas closest to the dune and the Roman ruins are considered a protected area.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1D Calle del Turismo
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1D Calle del Turismo
description: Clean industrial area. Good spot if you just want to pull of the highway to sleep. It gets pretty quiet after about 20:00.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 32 Avenida de los Agricultores
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 32 Avenida de los Agricultores
description: Speedy Wash self-service laundromat with 2 washing machines (10kg & 17kg) and 2 dryers (12kg & 18kg). Payment by credit card and smartphone possible. Parking spaces for mobile homes are available, as it is in the industrial area.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 24 Calle la Peñita
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 24 Calle la Peñita
description: Parking very close to the center of Conil. You can park vans and AC without problem. Site for about 30 vehicles. Quiet area but without services although they have shops quite close on foot.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Avenida del Río
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Avenida del Río
description: Water source

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1A Calle Alcalá del Valle
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1A Calle Alcalá del Valle
description: Public dirt parking lot, bumpy, crowded and noisy, people come after the party and make noise, also people early to leave the car and between each other... you don't sleep much, but in Conil there is little else to park ...

name: Parking Playa Bolonia
title: (11391) Parking Playa Bolonia
description:
Ground parking, without services, 50 m from the beach, quiet.
For a walk in the natural park of the strait.
Guardian at the entrance.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 6 Calle Olvera
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 6 Calle Olvera
description: Flat place, very quiet, near the center, quite spacious and with little traffic, we spent a couple of nights in summer quietly and without problems, free of charge. It does not have services of any kind, it looks like school deterrent parking.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 40 Calle Pascual Junquera
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 40 Calle Pascual Junquera
description: Hardware store that replaces small gas cylinders, camping-gas type. Very practical!

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 7 Calle Almadraba
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 7 Calle Almadraba
description: Drinking water fountain in front of the entrance to the municipal library of Conil. There is also parking (on land) where you can stop next to the fountain and fill your tank with bottles. The faucet does not have a thread for adapters. ps: in Oct.2022 the street area is undergoing renovations and improvements, so to access the car park you have to enter through Antonio Piné street. almost reaching the intersection with Almadraba street.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle María Zambrano
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle María Zambrano
description: Large municipal dirt car park, with a slight slope, easy access and well located for visiting Conil, and there is no street market on Fridays, as in other nearby car parks

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Calle Laguna
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Calle Laguna
description: Very clean and good machines! I can only recommend!

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - C. Josefina Aldecoa
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - C. Josefina Aldecoa
description: Laundromat open 365days 7am-11pm with excellent, clean facilities 2 large drying machines 20kg each & 3 washing machines 20kg, 15kg & 10kg all run on 30min cycles & washing liquid is included in the prices (see photo for details). Snacks & drinks machine available with seating & laundry baskets and table. Parking nearby on wasteland opposite Burger King & next to Aldi

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 5Z Avenida de la Música
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 5Z Avenida de la Música
description: Marketplace. Friday until 16:00 reserved for the market.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 8 Avenida de la Música
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 8 Avenida de la Música
description:
Petrolia gas station:
- Attended by Staff
   • Monday to Friday from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m.
   • Saturday and Sunday from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m.
- AC car wash and Camper.
- Shop with local products
- Vacuum cleaner, water, air cylinders butane, propane and campingaz

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Autovía de la Luz
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Autovía de la Luz
description: Sewage drainage area. For residual water, you have to empty it with a bucket, or use the car wash channel, but whose height is limited to 2.90 m. For water, the faucet handle has been removed. There is another area in the direction of Algeciras. Bathrooms open to the public with shower.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 424 Diseminado Dehesa Villa
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 424 Diseminado Dehesa Villa
description: Ground level in front of a multitude of businesses. Next to a petrol station. At the site, about 10 motorhomes, vans, camper vans, etc. enter in parallel.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 10B Avenida de la Música
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 10B Avenida de la Música
description: Open-air area, it is allowed to spend the night day and night, ten minutes from the center. Pharmacy, super market, etc.

title: (11391) Tarifa - CA-8202
description: Nice views, quiet place, to park and spend the night

title: () Barrio Nuevo -
description: Service station with motorhome area.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 15X Avenida de la Música
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 15X Avenida de la Música
description: Drinking water source. It is a fountain in a park that works, because the ones on the beach are out of service, I don't know if because of the covid or what. The pressure is good, the carafes can be filled quickly.

title: (11140) Cádiz - 3F Camino Chiclana
description: Esplanade with a very large parking area. Most of it is in the sun but there are some holes in the shade under some trees where we have been parked. It is 3 steps from a Mercadona

title: (11391) Tarifa - CA-8202
description: Nice couple of park ups along the side of the road. Not too difficult to find flat areas. No services, but not too far from some in either direction. Not in national park. Stayed 2 nights and no issues. Great views of the valley!

title: (11391) Facinas - CA-221
description: Very quiet place next to the pool and soccer field 300 m from the town of Facinas, sales and very good quality restaurants.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 52 Avenida de la Libertad
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 52 Avenida de la Libertad
description: Parking in line with trees. At 10 minutes from the center

name: Camping Eucalyptus
title: (11140) Camping Eucalyptus
description: Camping Los Eucaliptos. 15 minutes walk from the center of Conil. Basic but with a pool.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 305 Calle Fuente Gallo
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 305 Calle Fuente Gallo
description: Fairground area, quiet and overnight possibility

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 18 Avenida de los Barcos
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 18 Avenida de los Barcos
description: It is a street surrounded by new residential houses. Very quiet and with little traffic movement. Very close access to La Fontanilla beach. More AC parked on site.

title: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle Crucero
title_short: (11140) Conil de la Frontera - 1 Calle Crucero
description: On the parking strip. View across a field to the sea. Very quiet.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida Fuente del Gallo, 5
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida Fuente del Gallo, 5
description: Private plot for parking and overnight for motorhomes at the moment only electricity and water service, no drainage. Quiet plot to rest.

name: Camping La Rosaleda
title: (11149) Camping La Rosaleda
description: Terraced campsite with mainly level pitches. ACSII card accepted

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 2 Arrabal Urb Ply Roqueo
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 2 Arrabal Urb Ply Roqueo
description: Parking day and night. Possibility to spend the night. In front of the sea and the beach. Near a restaurant. Great location

title: (11391) Facinas - Ctra. Nacional N-340
description: Old disused road where you can park 2 or 3 large motorhomes. very nice view of the mountain and Andalusian cows. a large embankment and trees protect from the road. we stopped for lunch on our way to cadiz. surely possible to spend the night but maybe a bit noisy.

title: (11391) Facinas - CA-221
description: A source of water close to a playground

title: (11391) Tarifa - km.70 N-340
description: It is an esplanade where there was a hotel that is now for sale. It is located at the crossroads in the direction of Bolonia beach (you cannot spend the night there as it is a natural park). We slept in the restaurant el tropezón and at 2 at night we had to come to shelter here because of the wind. Quiet place.

title: (11158) Los Naveros - 7 Calle Nueva
description: Good then rotate rest, with bars nearby and soccer fields just behind. Flat area with some sand around 15 motorhomes. Nice neighbors, 13km from Conil and 16km from Medina Sidonia

title: (11391) Tarifa - 25 Lugar Betis
description: On the start of the hiking trail around Betis a flat parking spot surrounded by cows in semi-liberties. No service.

title: (11190) Benalup-Casas Viejas - 27 Calle Clavel
description: Super quiet and central place at the edge of a small town. Limited 72 h for park. Large spaces and all necessary facilities.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 2 CA-221
description: Fountain available along a road where there is also a mountain bike trail. The road is blocked a little further. Quiet corner where we ate under the supervision of two very curious horses.

title: (11391) Tarifa - 1 Paraje de Betis
description: Magnificent views of the sea and the Moroccan coasts, on the heights of Bologna. Easy access, quiet, accessible van and motorhome. Night prohibited, classified natural area.

title: (11190) Benalup-Casas Viejas - 0 Calle Paternilla
description: Esplanade / parking next to the football field.

title: (11391) Tarifa - Calle Algeciras
description: Source of drinking water in a small village where locals also fill up their canisters.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 5 Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 5 Avenida de Extremadura
description: Residential area parking next to the access to the beach. Quiet at night

name: Conil rural campsite
title: (11149) Conil rural campsite
description: Conil rural campsite, quiet, lots of shade, large and clean pitches, pleasant staff. Basic bar, shop without fresh products or bread, no eggs or milk etc. Pool could improve. a lot of noise, they allow loud music at all hours. nothing for children, no park or activities

name: Camping Fuente Del Gallo, S.L.
title: (11149) Camping Fuente Del Gallo, S.L.
description: Camping Fuente Del Gallo, 300 meters from the sea, 2 kms from the city center, it has a swimming pool, bar-restaurant, supermarket, laundry and a car wash and emptying station for vehicles. The reception of the camp-site is very average, the alleys are a little narrow according to the size of a camper. There is the advantage of a bus stop 200 meters to the city center.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - 19 Avenida de Extremadura
description: Quiet parking for a night. At the end of a street in a residential area. Access to the route of the cliffs. Without services.

title: (11190) Benalup-Casas Viejas - A-2226
description: Hiking parking next to the road. Forbidden to stay the night

title: () Benalup-Casas Viejas - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place away from the road that leads to the Celemín reservoir. It is quite quiet to spend the night and has space for 2 motorhomes or 1 motorhome. It is on the side of a dirt road in good condition, with a few cars passing from time to time. There are no lights around, a perfect place to see the stars. It doesn't seem like staying overnight is forbidden (no signs), but I suggest being careful (staying 1-2 nights max). Trivia: there are cows!

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida de Extremadura
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Avenida de Extremadura
description: Parking area at the end of a street with access to the beach, I have been in December at this time of year it is a quiet area

title: (11391) Tarifa - 6 CA-221
description: Los Tornos recreational area. open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. With water fountains and garbage containers. Picnic areas in a very well-kept young cork oak forest. Kiosk beach bar in the same area.

title: (11190) Benalup-Casas Viejas - Unnamed Road
description: When the reservoir is dry there are some good areas to spend the day

title: () Benalup-Casas Viejas - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot on the edge of the reservoir. We stayed on the meadow in December to get closer to the water.

title: (11149) - 98 Diseminado Roche Viejo
description: Pleasant and quiet private estate, very spacious, for 5 campers (up to 6.40m) and with shared kitchen, bathrooms, outdoor dining area, small swimming pool and areas with sun loungers and hammocks.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Carril de Pilahito 3
title_short: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - Carril de Pilahito 3
description: Beautiful horse finca in the middle of the pine forest. A magical spot for people who love being in nature with animals. You will have the chance to get in touch with our horses, dogs, cats and chickens. People who would love to ride have the chance to book a lesson. We are still building our place and would be happy to share it with you. We have Wifi, a shower in the forest and a separating toilet (to save water). Also you can use the outside kitchen for cooking or dishwashing. Looking forward to see you soon! Please contact us via phone (WhatsApp) for availability.

name: Camping Roche
title: (11149) Camping Roche
description: Camping Roche in the pine forest. The pitches for caravans and motorhomes are flat and wide.

title: () Tarifa - A-2325
description: Parking with a few trees and surrounded by forest. 5 minutes walk from the beach of Punta Paloma and 10 minutes from the long beach Valdevaqueros. Without sea view. Very quiet, with the sound of crickets and a few other vans.Overnight prohibited

name: Camping El Faro
title: (11149) Camping El Faro
description: CAMPING LIGHTHOUSE. 3* Large campsite with many pitches of various sizes. Swimming pool, supermarket, children's area and entertainment (in season) and paddle tennis courts. Possibility to grill. Vehicle washing area. Street with access to the beach 10 minutes walk. Shady pitches separated by hedges, most with grass. They accept pets that are not considered dangerous breeds. Close to hiking and mountain biking trails. Card/cash payment. Sanitary facilities are very clean and well maintained. Beach very far away on foot. 600 m. Beach Bar. Very friendly service. The pool is very clean and pleasantly warm.

title: (11380) Tarifa - A-2325
description: Some parking spaces on land in the countryside, ideal for visiting the dune.

name: Camping Paloma
title: (11380) Camping Paloma
description: Quiet weekday campsite in high season 1 km from Punta Paloma beach, away from the main road and shaded. Very friendly welcome. Swimming pool.

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202
description: The parking lot of the lighthouse is not very big

title: (11149) - 999 Diseminado Roche Viejo
description: Entrance on the way to the hunting ground. In the middle of nature although in the middle of a bike path. Very calm

title: (11149) Barrio Nuevo - 124D Diseminado Barrio Nuevo
description: Repsol service station, has a water tap

title: (11149) Roche -
description: Quiet and clean place half sun half shade

title: (11149) Conil de la Frontera - CA-4202
description: Parking next to conil's coves. Quiet to spend the night and go to the beach. Only for vans!
